name: Back-to-Back March
nutshell: The soft and sweet story of two childhood friends with neighboring shops.

name: Natsu no Koshien
nutshell: Natsuko is a very athletic girl that quit being on the baseball team after junior high, after being rejected by her crush Daichi. After some time, Daichi and the baseball team need one more person to play against another team or they will have to forfeit, so Natsuko is begged to stand-in. However, she stays on the team longer than expected.

name: A Gyaru With Zero Self-Restraint
nutshell:
More gyaru yuri from Sezaki Umi

Links:
 Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: The Maou Is Troubled by the Suicidal Heroine
nutshell:
High school girl Mana, who despairing at life committed suicide, is reluctantly revived in another world. As an immortal female hero…
In desperation Mana travels to the Devil's castle to be rid of her immortality. As even the devil can't kill Mana for good, she threatens him "If you can't kill me, I'll kill you."
New sensation, suicide desire comedy series!

name: Yoru no Osomatsu-san ~ jinsei dai bakuchi!
nutshell: Osomatsu-san at night ~ Life big bakuchi! ~ Official anthology comic

name: Serugei Oukoku no Kage Tsukai
nutshell:
In the history of the Kingdom of Siegerland, there has always been a powerful Shadow Messenger who acted as a guardian for the country. Yet the Shadow Messenger himself doesn’t have a shadow!
Every Shadow Messenger chooses a guardian out of all the knights. In order to show his devotion, the knight then offers his own shadow as a gift to the Shadow Messenger and by that becomes a Swordsman.
Lisa is a normal girl who leads a happy life like everyone else, when suddenly her father dies a tragic death. From that day onwards, her mother forbids her to leave the house. In the end, she secretly steals away with her childhood friend Louis. They are playing outside, when her playmates die under strange circumstances… Only Lisa survives, but she lost her memories of that day…

name: Love Live! - Nijigasaki Academy School Idol Club (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A collection of doujinshi of Love Live! - Nijigasaki Academy School Idol Club

name: Touhou Project - Hariko no Ura ha (Doujinshi)
Sf Kiseki
nutshell:
Namiki Denji has a problem - he fell in love with two girls at the same time, and can't tell who his true love really is.
Things just get worse when his grandaughter comes back from the future wishing to meet her grandmother!

name: Anniversary
nutshell: In "Anniversary," a lesbian couple makes love for the first time.

name: Penguin Musume MAX
nutshell: Continuation of the adventures of Nankyoku Sakura, who is also known as penguin by her friends. She is obsessed with anime and manga, for example she goes to school wearing a school swimsuit, cat ears, and a maid tiara and calls it her “casual clothes”! She’s also insanely rich.

name: Touhou - Hello!! The World! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: "Another Renko and Mary doujin, bringing up the rear end of this update. They just can’t get behind a mysterious appearance in their room that can’t seem to be arsed to explain itself, and are determined to get to the bottom of it."

name: Gone
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color,Tragedy
nutshell:
Spore virus has been affecting millions of people. This is a short 8-episode story of two different people whose close companions are infected by the spore virus.
Fançais :
Le virus des spores a affecté des millions de personnes. C'est une courte histoire de huit épisodes dans laquelle, deux personnages voient leur amour être contaminé.

name: Kannade
nutshell:
Hayama Akita is also known as a Masterpieces thief : God Hand. But the art pieces he stole are copies painted by his missing mom.
One day he was caught by a black market broker. A mysterious mark appears in his desparation to escape, as does his new ability, "Kannade".

name: Kuso Joushi wa Yari Mederu Monoto Kokoroe yo
nutshell: It's all because of the arrogant, condescending prick that is supposed to be my boss, power harassing me again and again… ! He was so cute, and now I really want to fuck him… !?

name: Yajuu Kanojo
nutshell:
Yajuu Kanojo
Naruse likes beautiful things, so he wants to go out with Misuzu, but the moment he does she turns into a beast?!


Ookami Kareshi
Continuation of Yajuu Kanojo. This time it's Riku who becomes a beast in Misuzu's eyes. How will she cope?


Onnaji Mesen (Eye to Eye)
Hana used to be a lot taller than Souta. Now that they're in high school, everything has changed. Now he's the taller one with a hoard of fans as he is the ace of basketball. Everyday, the distance between the two seems to drift further apart…


Bianca
The androgynous second year basketball ace, Aida Leona has been confessed by the kouhai Mori Kenta. Thinking he was gay, and her disinterest in guys, she turned him down instantly. Leo had a crush on a beautiful girl she encountered at middle school, and thus the only person she ever was interested in. But Kenta is persistent, and Leo may have found a connection from Kenta, to finally find her mysterious crush…


Chimudondon
Satoru moves to Okinawa and is bored out of his mind because there's nothing to do. Can he find something that gets his heart pumping?


Boku no Kirai na Akuma (Evil Resident)
Maa-kun is plagued by a demon that only he can see! How can he get rid of it?

name: Lost + Brain
nutshell: Ren Hiyama, a genius student was tired of the boring world. While he was thinking of recreating the world, he realizes that with hypnosis, he may be able to do that. After a year of testing with his classmates, recreation of the world begins.

name: Chitose-kun is Inside a Ramune Bottle
nutshell:
"Class 5's Chitose Saku is a fucking playboy!"
Chitose Saku is at the top of the school caste. He and his friends are textbook examples of normies, despised by the less fortunate.
Surrounded by girls and boys of every kind, he's chosen to lead his second-year class by his laid-back advisor.
Watch how he and his friends reap the bounty of youth in this new romantic comedy!


Adaptation of Light Novel - Anilist
Official English Publisher - Yen Press

name: Myth Front
nutshell:
By the time the universe was formed, it was connected with a record which covered everything.
And it was called “Acacia Records”
“Acacia Records” was regarded as a symbol of wisdom of the whole universe.
Even Gods and Demons also yearned to reach the root of the universe.

name: Hentai Elf to Majime Orc
nutshell: After the Great War, a young Orc lived peacefully and vowed to himself to never attack any human or elf, let alone violate someone. One day he meets a lost Elf who claims that she's lost, because she was searching for an Orc to violate her. She seems pretty persistent and will do anything to get violated. Will this young Orc be able to hold up to his promise or will he fail?

name: K - Oasis (Doujinshi)
nutshell: In a series of flashbacks and stream-of-consciousness scenes, Kuroh remembers his time with Shiro and reflects on all they shared and all they might have had–and may still be able to have. [obviously contains spoilers for the series]

name: Yamase wa Doko e Itta?
nutshell:
The boy that Kidou Aina accidentally helped- Yamase confessed to her out of the blue. Quickly putting her foot down, the shock had caused Yamase to be admitted!? When Aina went to visit him, a shocking scene unveiled in front of her…
[MusesScans]

name: Yuuhi Romance
nutshell: Yuu is famous for having an extreme brother complex. In reality, she has emotions for her little brother, Hiro, which have far exceeded a normal sisterly love. A little complicated family love comedy from the author of "Hyakko." This is a story of forbidden love with an older sister, a younger brother and their half sibling Tomo as well.

name: Koi to wa Donna Mono Kashira
Dancing Heihou Hehou
nutshell:
Heihou Hehou joins the dancing army he once admired, but quickly comes to find it has completely changed.
One of the 4 winners of the "New World Manga Award" published in Issue 1 of Jump GIGA Winter 2019.

name: The Freudstein Twins
nutshell:
A university tutor meets a couple of very strange students… and other stories.
A collection of horror stories by Sachiko Uguisu/Hiyodori. The first 3 chapters are about the Freudstein twins, while the others are stand-alones

name: Wild Arms 4 - Go Die (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Several years after the game, the crew finally has their reunion. Arnaud reminisces about his life with Raquel, only to have the tiniest member of the group steal the show. Other stories include Raquel’s quest to master cooking to fill a tragic past, and Raquel… attempting to kidnap Jude.

name: Hell's Kitchen
nutshell:
Dogma, the Earl of Poor eating comes to train high school student Satoru into the perfect chef. But what awaits Satoru at the end of his training is only death. His teacher is not an ordinary noble but a demon from hell who promises to eat his soul, spiced with a lifetime of cooking expertise. Will Satoru abandon his normal life to become the puppet of this demonic earl? How will he cope with his life’s expiry tag?
Let’s have a taste of this Heresy Gourmet!

name: Konna Hatsukoi
nutshell:
A collestion of short stories.
1-3. Konna Hatsukoi
The super shy Kashiwagi Makoto from the student council has never been in love before. Although she thinks the popular new student Yanase Yutaka-kun is quite unapproachable, she comes in direct contact with him one day as a part of her student council duties?


Kirai Uta
Riko has always liked her friend Mori Yuuma, but whenever they're around each other they just argue and bicker. Will she be able to tell him how she feels before graduation?


Kimi Daruma.
It’s almost Christmas, and Yukine wants to show Touma how thankful she is for having a boyfriend like him. She decides to plan their Christmas date and the both of them are expecting it to be a wonderful time!


Ano Okata no Tansho


Kimi wo Mamoru Hana


Omikuji no Usotsuki

name: Nerawareta Muku
nutshell: Alena, the 19-year-old scion of a well-respected, old Russian family, falls in love at first sight with Kiryl, a man she met in the lobby of a high-class hotel. He cuts a devilishly stylish figure, so she has no idea that this man who wears an air of danger around him like cologne has painfully risen up from the slums to become a billionaire. With his sweet words and the simple press of his lips to the back of her hand, Alena readily offers up her body and her heart to him. She could have no idea, at the height of her happiness, that the dazzling pleasures he offers her are, for him, a means to revenge!

name: Mutekitekki Spin-chan
nutshell:
It will be the first year of high school for Tooru and as such, she decided to go live with her gradpa to be close to the school.
But it turns out that the old man is a robot engineer with a peculiar dream… for which he created the robot assistant Spin!
What will happen to Tooru from now on!?
